text: @DawnButlerBrent Sorry for your loss and condolences to you, your family and friends at this sad time.  I am sad to say but you will not be the only one expressing your anger at this Tory Govt's CoVid-19 policies.  It is just not good enough. Insufficient testing, PPEs and Ventilators.
